title: Half of Europe's coronavirus deaths were residents in aged care homes, WHO says
description: The spate of deaths in aged care facilities is described as a human tragedy by the European director of the World Health Organization.
content:
Updated 
April 24, 2020 11:45:31
As many as half of all coronavirus deaths in Europe are residents of aged care facilities, the World Health Organization (WHO) says.
<ul><li>The large number of aged care deaths from coronavirus has been described as a "hum… [+1540 chars]
